forum.content: I am an ordinary woman but have millions of dreams that I want to achieve in this time and then. I made it happen with the hard work, prayer and hope and support from those who love me with sincerity who never tired to accompany me.Thank you for being present in my life: * when all have been achieved you are the one who really want me to meet and share with you until there is no word farewell then we will remember the hard times, sick, sad, hard, happy together so please wait a moment now I'm trying to make it happen and never tire of praying for me.Are you guys that ?? Will you go with me to make it happen ?? !!
forum.title: My Dream
